title: tread93
author: tread93
created_time: January 02, 2023, 01:52:56 PMLast edit: January 03, 2023, 02:16:40 AM by tread93
content: Hey Everyone,Happy New Year! This website used to be an online bitcoin gambling hub HQed out of the virgin islands. I would go here sometimes to get some free sats and free spins in games. Some of my friends have won a considerable amount of bitcoin through this website. They had an incentive to hold bitcoin in their address sort of like blockfi used to have where you got like 4% interest or something like that (bad idea). A lot of people who held their coins on there have certainly lost them all. SMH.Anyways, I just went to go back and check it out, it appears that this web prompting popped up leading me to believe that they have closed shop permanently probably due to a scam or government shutdown? Or just simply moved to a new web address (which I can't find): "This site can‚Äôt be reachedThe webpage at https://freebitco.in/ might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address.ERR_TUNNEL_CONNECTION_FAILED" Is anyone familiar with this gambling page, and does anyone know what happened to it? What is strange is that I am still getting emails from their domain email address but the website is still not showing, just odd. Maybe i'm doing something wrong or I need to try on another browser. This is my first post in the gambling section, and I plan to make many more informative posts such as this. Cheers, TREAD

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: You are talking rubbish. Freebitco.in is up and running as usual. Sometimes there are some offline moments due to DDoS attacks and things like that, but as it happened in the forum as well. It's a very popular site and used a lot by forum members. I've just logged in and it's going well.Here is their official thread: ¬†¬†¬†FreeBitco.in-$200 FreeBTC‚≠êWin Lamboüî•0.2BTC DailyJackpotüèÜ$32,500 Wager Contest

comments.body: Quote from: tread93 on January 02, 2023, 01:52:56 PMI plan to make many more informative posts such as this. I hope you wouldn't, because this kind thread doesn't have any information at all and it seems everyone are fine to access the site including myself.If you have any problem regarding this casino, it's better if you post in their main thread that has been mentioned by @Don Pedro Dinero since they have an active representative e.g. Thequin.Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on January 02, 2023, 02:01:14 PMQuote from: tread93 on January 02, 2023, 01:52:56 PMA lot of people who held their coins on there have certainly lost them all. open a thread on Scam Accusations, but provide evidence.Honestly I don't see any complaint from any user lost their coin on the freebitco.in's bankroll investment, I think @OP is mistakenly explain or his friend is abusing the site.

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: Quote from: tread93 on January 02, 2023, 01:52:56 PMMaybe i'm doing something wrong or I need to try on another browser.  it's up and running. Maybe you need to reinstall your browser or clear the cache. And make sure your VPN is not active/ON as some sites don't allow you to use VPN.Quote from: tread93 on January 02, 2023, 01:52:56 PMThis is my first post in the gambling section, and I plan to make many more informative posts such as this. Thanks for your informative post ser.Hope next time you don't just copy-paste the website link into the title of your post.
